1.content: So who or what are you
1.title: Start of your adventure

11.content: So your a trainer with no Pokemon what gender are you?
11.title: Trainer (No pokemon)

111.content: Good. Now, what gender will the Pokemon have?
111.title: Male

1111.content: What pokemon do you encounter?
1111.title: Male

11111.content: But which pokemon from this gen do you get
11111.title: Gen 1

choices: Nah he wanted to be your friend
1111111.content: You saw a wild charmander witch was rare and unfortunately you had no pokeball but you did have a pokedex and pull it and it said ( Charmander, the Lizard Pokémon. When the tip of Charmander's tail burns brightly, that indicates it's in good health.) and it seamed to be male and seemed nice. The charmander followed you around witch was pretty cute you couldn't lie, but you got the ideal to measure his height it was 3 feet a whole foot taller than normal so that was neat, but he keep following you. when you got back home
1111111.title: Charmander

11111112.content:
You noticed that the Charmander was right behind you he must want you to be his friend. You invited him into your home and got him some berries that grew around hear. You thought to yourself you haven't seen any other pokemon besides this Charmander on this island that professor oak sent you to.

The island was odd it wasn't on any map and no one saw it before and ships passed near the island daily. So either no one had visited it or it popped into the world. You had been here for a month now and only reported on 3 new berries types and nothing else and man those berries were good. There was a blue,red,and purple berry you named the Strength berry because you felt like it increased your strength, then there was the yellow,green,brown berry you named the Endurance berry as you felt that you do more activity with that one, and the best one a Sliver berry witch you named the god berry because of its incredible flavor.

The Charmander was happily munching away at the berries so you filled a report to professor oak that there was at least one pokemon on this island but it was one that was known nothing new besides the berries. You had the ideal to do lab work on your new friend, but you did ask first before doing it and Charmander nodded it's head and then you took two blood samples. One for DNA and the other to make sure your new friend was healthy, but that would take the rest of the day what do you do in the meantime
11111112.title: Nah he wanted to be your friend

111232.content: Do you want one of the starters?
111232.title: More choices

1112322.content:
How about an adorable Wooloo?

https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/1/1f/...
1112322.title: Fluffy Sheep

11123221.content:
The morning air feels crisp and fresh and the early sun beam on you, as you set off to take a nice walk through the fields. You recently moved to an out there town to get away from the city life for a while, out of the noisy streets and more into the wavy plains of the wilderness. The place you decided to call home is a bit far from civilization, and there is a some amount of wild Pokemon that show up here, but they are so low leveled that an attack from them feels more like they're playing with you than being aggressive.

As you take your morning walk, you notice a weird red glowing material on the ground. Huh, this thing looks very funky, doesn't it. You cautiously pick it up, as it does.... nothing. You inspect it some more, and find it not that interesting other than its pulsing red light, so you toss it behind you and continue on your walk. As you walk, you glance back behind you to see a wild Wooloo that likes to hang out near your house inspecting the rock you just threw. From the times that you actually encountered the Wooloo, you figured out that they're a girl, and that when you approached her, she rolled away. Then you notice that the Wooloo then too started to glow red like the rock, but she also starts to.... grow?

At first, it was a small growth, noticeable, but small, until she then started to escalate in size, having you crane your head just to see her head. The Wooloo looks very confused as well, backing up a little and looking around the place for help. Soon she stops growing, and the red glow also faded away. If you had to guess, she was about 200 ft tall, or maybe even more. You are probably half the size of the Wooloo's leg at the present minute.

"Woolooo?" The Wooloo calls out confused. She's probably confused on how big she is. Though you don't want to really deal with a giant sheep, you do feel bad for throwing the rock in the first place.

"Hey! Down here!" You try to get the attention of the Wooloo, which works, as she looks down at you. You see her legs fold, as she lays down in front of you. Wow, that is a whole lot of wool. Her face then covers your vision, you just barely reaching above her heart shaped nose. Her gray dreadlocks on the side of her face now both lay on the ground, making it so that you are kinda walled in.

"Wo?" The Wooloo peeps, inspecting you. You reach out your hand toward the Wooloo to pet her, as she...
11123221.title: Like a cloud.

12.title: Trainer (Team)

13.content: Are you wild or not
13.title: Pokemon

info.brief_description: Pokemon start growing or big already
info.description:
Rules
1. The pokemon or pokemons must be gentle and can evolve.
2. As a result of the growth they get more powerful, but they might not take notice right away or at all.
3. Forgot to add this but can be anthro or not and they can transform. As for legendary's you see what you want to see
4. The team options should have more than one pokemon with no max besides the six that is in the games, but maybe a pokemon can change that ;)
